– layout: post title: Beans on Toast wordpress_id: 54 wordpress_url: http://www.drtoast.com/crumbs/54 date: 2005-08-10 03:00:34.000000000 -07:00 categories: - toast-recipes — from Mark Evans (MEvans@tradingedge.com)

How can you have a toast site and not have a beans on toast recipe?!?!?

  • Two slices Toast
  • Butter
  • Baked Beans

Toast bread, butter bread, ladle 1 scoop of beans per slice of toast. Excellent!
